column2: AMAZING!! We sat at the bar tonight
column4: and it was perfect! Our bartender was Angela
column5: and we couldn't have asked for better. We were celebrating our anniversary and she treated us so well! We had the wedge
column6: Chicago cut ribeye (rare plus)!and loaded potato. The steak was done perfect!! Everything about our dinner was perfect. We even got ice cream with a sparkler! We will be back! Thank you Bavette's!!
